body_html:
If you include linkstatic=1 as well, does it work?
It appears that with linkshared only, it will be in the DYNAMIC case listed for linkstatic here: https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/be/c-cpp.html

(this is guessing that there is a .so available at runtime that provides the operators from an older release of tensorflow)
body_text:
If you include linkstatic=1 as well, does it work?
It appears that with linkshared only, it will be in the DYNAMIC case listed for linkstatic here: https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/be/c-cpp.html
(this is guessing that there is a .so available at runtime that provides the operators from an older release of tensorflow)
body:
If you include linkstatic=1 as well, does it work?
It appears that with linkshared only, it will be in the DYNAMIC case listed for linkstatic here: https://bazel.build/versions/master/docs/be/c-cpp.html

(this is guessing that there is a .so available at runtime that provides the operators from an older release of tensorflow)
